name: Alex Ramirez
content: As a small team, we were drowning in manual cold calls and inconsistent follow-up. Deal Scale's AI Phone Agent completely changed the game. It handles all the initial outreach and filters the noise, letting us 3x our deal flow without adding headcount. We now focus on closing, not prospecting.
problem: Our small team was spending 20+ hours a week on manual cold calls with a very low connection rate. Good leads were slipping through the cracks because we couldn't follow up consistently.
solution: Deal Scale's AI Phone Agent became our new team member. It automates all top-of-funnel outreach, qualifying leads 24/7 and ensuring we only spend time on motivated, sales-ready sellers.
